org.hornetq.api.core

Interface DiscoveryGroupConfigurationCompatibilityHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JGroupsBroadcastGroupConfiguration, UDPBroadcastGroupConfiguration

    public interface DiscoveryGroupConfigurationCompatibilityHelper
    This interface is needed for making a DiscoveryGroupConfiguration backward compatible with version 2.2 clients. It is used to extract from new BroadcastEndpointFactoryConfiguration the four UDP attributes in order to form a version 2.2 DiscoveryGroupConfiguration in time of serialization.
    Author:
    Andy Taylor 12/13/12
    See Also:
    org.hornetq.api.core.DiscoveryGroupConfiguration.readObject(ObjectInputStream), org.hornetq.api.core.DiscoveryGroupConfiguration.writeObject(ObjectOutputStream)
